Evolution Summary
This page displays everything necessary to evolve . Click on each evolveable icon to expand it as desired. You can also expand all or collapse all.

You may customize the tree by overriding the evo materials required. This is most useful for replacing an evolution gem with materials that you plan on exchanging for it. This feature isn't as important anymore due to the Gem Temple dungeon, so please manually enter the IDs you would like to replace. Click here to replace something.
Evolution Tree
Summary
You do not need any materials - everything is marked as already owned.
